meta.title: Form Select
meta.description: Custom <select> component using cross-browser custom styles. Optionally generate <option> entries based on an array, array of objects.

props.description: Optional value to set for the 'aria-invalid' attribute. Supported values are 'true' and 'false'. If not set, the 'state' prop will dictate the value
The key to use from the option object to get the label
When set, allows multiple options to be selected (multi-select)
The key to use from the option object to get the options
When set to a number larger than 0, will set the number of display option rows. Note not all browser will respect this setting
Set the size of the component's appearance. 'sm', 'md' (default), or 'lg'
Current value of the select. Should be set to an array when the 'multiple' prop is set

events.description: Emitted when the select value changes via user interaction

args.description: Current selected value(s) of the select

events.description: Emitted when the select value changes

args.description: Current selected value(s) of the select

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the form select

slots.name: first
slots.description: Slot to place options or option groups above options provided via the 'options' prop

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the form select option

props.description: The label for the option group

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the form select option group

slots.name: first
slots.description: Slot to place options above options provided via the 'options' prop
